channel.title: Very fine adjustment no longer working
channel.description: I'm finding that shift+ctrl no longer works for very fine adjustment and just gives me the 'normal fine' adjustment. I just updated to 1.0.11 (from something really old like 1.0.7) so it seems the most likely cause. I'm on Windows 8.1, any ideas?

item.title: Very fine adjustment no longer working
item.dc:creator: @SirPrimalform
item.description:
@SirPrimalform wrote:

Phew. I can just type the numbers until then.

Read full topic

item.title: Very fine adjustment no longer working
item.dc:creator: @DrJustice
item.description:
@DrJustice wrote:

I can confirm this. Shift and Control alone or together give the same "normal fine" adjustment, and the "very fine" adjustment is missing. I'm running Windows 10 and Axoloti 1.0.11

Read full topic
